column2: Rose Rennick arrived a few minutes after four, accompanied by two small dogs and wearing an outrageously large hat.
column3: Not a Penny More, Not a Penny Less

column2: When Odell arrived back at the hotel a few minutes after four, the first thing he did was order a large flask of hot fruit punch before walking out onto the veranda to take up his post.
She read the page carefully and then said, "16.03 - cat goes to the toilet in front garden."
